title: Clubs are still having disappearing issues?
body:
Hi all....are we still having the clubs disappearing issue? The last update I saw was 12 days ago...and I am still experiencing that...

Club name: Toronto Killer Group
Club tag: TorKG
Summoner name: soulhan

I contacted my friends who are in the club. They said I am still the owner of the group. However I do not see the tag, nor do I see the club when I log in. I cannot add new friends to the club.

I have filed a request #24272033. Any other info is appreciated!

replies.body:
Submitting a support ticket for this was the right move, as we've resolved this issue for most players and are dealing with the remaining issues on a case-by-case basis. One of our specialists will be happy to help you out from here inside your ticket.

Let me know if you have any questions.
